name: Footprints Festival

config_properties.name: Footprints Festival
config_properties.description: A curated discovery festival at TivoliVredenburg in Utrecht, showcasing emerging international artists across diverse genres.

ai_profile:
**Footprints Festival 2026: A Celebration of Musical Diversity**  

Footprints Festival 2026 brings together an eclectic mix of 11 boundary-pushing artists from across the globe, showcasing a kaleidoscope of genres that span Electronic, Jazz, Indie Pop, Psychedelic, Anatolian Rock, Malian Desert Blues, and more. With an average rating of 7.73, the lineup promises high-quality performances, blending experimental and traditional sounds to create a truly unique festival experience.  

The festival prides itself on its cultural and geographical diversity, featuring artists from 10 different countries, including Germany, Iran, Nigeria, Brazil, and Turkey. With 7 of the performers identifying as people of color, Footprints 2026 highlights underrepresented voices in the music scene. Additionally, the festival showcases a balance of male, female, and mixed-gender acts, further emphasizing its commitment to inclusivity and representation.  

Notable trends include the fusion of traditional and contemporary styles, such as the inclusion of Anatolian Rock and Traditional Iranian music alongside minimalist electropop and Afrobeat. This vibrant blend of genres and backgrounds unites the festivalâ€™s artists under a shared ethos of innovation and cultural exchange, making Footprints 2026 an unmissable event for music lovers seeking something extraordinary.
